name: Tiramisu
ingredients: 6 egg yolks,2/3 cup milk, 3/4 cup sugar, Ladies Finger Biscuit
steps: 1. Mix the egg yolks as with the sugar, slowly whisk the milk in over low heat. 2. Cook till custard is bubbling and leave it to cool and then refrigerate for 1 hr. 3.Mix in Mascarpone with the custard mixture and mix in the baileys. 4.Dip the biscuit with coffee and layer the biscuit and Mascarpone Layer
